summary: A simple mod that allows you to customize Mindi Badweyn with all the options you can expect from my customizers
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=6][center][/center][/size][/font][font=Verdana][center][img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/3020/cEtHND.png[/img]

[color=#93c47d][size=3][b][i]Be sure to follow me on [url=https://www.facebook.com/ClearanceClarenceMods]Facebook[/url] to get all the latest news [/i][/b][/size][/color]

[size=3][color=#e69138][b][i]Screenshots are Wanted! If some of you could upload some screenshots it would be much appreciated![/i][/b][/color][/size]

[size=3]This mod allows you to change the way Mindi looks. You can change the body textures and face textures.
[/size]

[img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/320x240q90/922/tUyKv0.png[/img]

[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/46458/?]Mindi Badweyn - A Nord Follower[/url][/size]
[size=4]If you plan to use Â TBBP meshes, you also require the following:[/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT Physics Extensions[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54044/?]HDT Breast And Butt Physics[/url][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton - XPMS [/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton Extended - XPMSE
[/url][/size]

[img]http://imageshack.com/a/img924/2578/9D7W5O.png[/img]

[color=#0b8db3][size=6]Manual Installation[/size][/color]
[size=3]Download the package you want and extract it using WinRar. Now you have 3 folders. Base, FOMod and Options. Delete the FOMod folder since you won't need it. Now go to the base folder and select the bodytype you want and open that folder and copy the .nif files to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\meshes\actor\character\Mindi[/color][/i] and overwrite the .nif files. Now the body is installed. Now go into the options folder and chose what kind of texture you want. Once you find it open it and copy the options you select to [i][color=#6aa84f]data\textures\actor\character\Mindi[/color][/i].[/size]
